data.text: The heavens declare the glory of God;
Day after day they pour forth speech;
their voice 19:4 LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew their measuring line has gone out into all the earth,
Like a bridegroom emerging from his chamber,
it rises at one end of the heavens
The Law of the LORD is perfect,
The precepts of the LORD are right,
The fear of the LORD is pure,
They are more precious than gold,
By them indeed Your servant is warned;
Who can discern his own errors?
Keep Your servant also from willful sins;
May the words of my mouth
